metadata.description: Frank's collection of Claude Code plugins for AI workflow optimization

plugins.name: claude-skills-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyze AI conversation exports to generate reusable Claude Skills

plugins.name: cloudflare-toolkit
plugins.description: AI-powered Cloudflare development toolkit that gets smarter with every use. Architecture inspired by Every's Compounding Engineering approach, adapted for Cloudflare Workers, Durable Objects, KV, R2, and edge computing. Includes 16 Cloudflare-focused agents and 6 commands with automatic validation and MCP integration.
